Verses: 1 rekobeyaam Erusalemukku Vandhapodhu, Isravelodu Yuththampannavum, Raajyaththaith Thannidamaagath Thiruppikkollavum, Yoodhaa Vamsaththaarum Benyameen Vamsaththaarumaagiya Therindhukollappatta Yuththaveeraraana Latchaththu Enbadhinaayiramperaik Koottinaan.
2 dhevanudaiya Manushanaagiya Semaayaavukkuk Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Undaagi, Avar Sonnadhu:
3 nee Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Rekobeyaam Ennum Saalomonin Kumaaranaiyum, Yoodhaavilum Benyameenilum Irukkira Ellaa Isravelaraiyum Nokki:

4 neengal Pogaamalum, Ungal Sagodhararodu Yuththampannaamalum Avaravar Thamtham Veettukkuth Thirumbungal; Ennaale Indhak Kaariyam Nadandhadhu Endru Karththaruraikkiraar Endru Sol Endraar; Appozhudhu Avargal Karththarudaiya Vaarththaigalukkuk Keezhppadindhu, Yerobeyaamukku Virodhamaai Yuththampannuvadhai Vittuth Thirumbip Poivittaargal.
5 rekobeyaam Erusalemil Vaasamaayirundhu, Yoodhaavile Aranaana Pattanangalaik Kattinaan.
6 avan Bethlagemum, Eththaamum, Thekkovaavum,
7 pedhsoorum, Sokovum, Adhullaamum,
8 kaaththum, Mareshaavum, Seeppum,
9 adhoraayeemum, Laageesum, Asekkaavum,
10 soraavum, Aayilonum, Epronum Aagiya Yoodhaavilum Benyameenilumirukkira Aranippaana Pattanangalaikkatti,
11 andha Aranippugalai Balappaduththi, Avaigalile Thalaivaraiyum, Aagaaramum Enneyum Dhraatcharasamumulla Pandagasaalaigalaiyum,
12 yoodhaavum Benyameenum Avan Patchaththilirukka, Ovvoru Pattanaththilum Parisaigalaiyum Eettigalaiyum Vaiththu, Avaigalai Migudhiyum Balappaduththinaan.
13 isravelengum Irukkira Aasaariyarum Leviyarum Thangal Ellaa Ellaigalilumirundhu Avanidaththil Vandhaargal.

14 leviyar Karththarukku Aasaariya Oozhiyancheyyaadhapadikku Yerobeyaamum Avan Kumaararum Avargalaith Thallippottapadiyinaal, Thangal Velinilangalaiyum Thangal Kaaniyaatchigalaiyumvittu, Yoodhaadhesaththukkum Erusalemukkum Vandhaargal.
15 avan Medaigalukkendrum, Peygalukkendrum, Thaan Undaakkina Kandrukkuttigalukkendrum Aasaariyargalai Erpaduththinaan.

16 andha Leviyarin Piragaale Isravelin Koththirangalilellaam Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththaraith Thedugiradharku, Thangal Irudhayaththai Neraakkinavargal Thangal Pidhaakkalin Dhevanaagiya Karththarukkup Paliyidumpadikku Erusalemukku Vandhaargal.

17 ippadi Moondru Varushamattum Yoodhaavin Raajyaththai Balappaduththi, Saalomonin Kumaaranaagiya Rekobeyaamaith Thidappaduththinaargal; Dhaaveedhum Saalomonum Nadandha Vazhiyile Moondruvarushamattum Nadandhaargal.
18 rekobeyaam Dhaaveedhin Kumaaranaagiya Erimoththin Kumaaraththi Magalaaththaiyum, Eesaayin Kumaaranaagiya Eliyaabin Kumaaraththi Abiyaayelaiyum Vivaagampanninaan.
19 ival Avanukku Eyoos Samariyaa Saagaam Ennum Kumaararaip Petraal.
20 avalukkuppiragu Apsalomin Kumaaraththiyaagiya Maagaalai Vivaagampanninaan; Aval Avanukku Abiyaavaiyum, Aththaayiyaiyum, Seesaavaiyum, Selomiththaiyum Petraal.

21 rekobeyaam Thannudaiya Manaivigal Marumanaiyaattigal Ellaarilum, Apsalomin Kumaaraththiyaagiya Maagaalai Snegiththaan; Padhinettu Manaivigalaiyum Arubadhu Marumanaiyaattigalaiyum Vivaagampanni, Irubaththettuk Kumaararaiyum Arubadhu Kumaaraththigalaiyum Petraan.
22 rekobeyaam Maagaalin Kumaaranaagiya Abiyaavai Avan Sagodhararukkulle Thalaivanum Periyavanumaaga Erpaduththinaan; Avanai Raajaavaakka Ninaiththaan.

23 avan Buththiyaai Nadandhu, Yoodhaa Benyameenudaiya Ellaa Dhesangalilumulla Aranaana Sagala Pattanangalilum Than Kumaarar Yaavaraiyum Piriththuvaiththu, Avargalukku Vendiya Aagaaraththaikkoduththu, Avargalukku Anegam Pengalaith Thedinaan
